Stone Sphere

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 316
horrormark chance [taint]: 3%
spell [itemspell]: #995 Astral Window

Requires 10S5E to forge (S2E1)

A smooth, black stone sphere wrapped in black cloth to protect it from the sun, it will become transparent when exposed to moonlight and will reveal shifting images of distant places.
